name: Kindred
title: The Eternal Hunters
lore: Separate, but never parted, Kindred represents the twin essences of death. Lamb's bow offers a swift release from the mortal realm for those who accept their fate. Wolf hunts down those who run from their end, delivering violent finality within his crushing jaws. Though interpretations of Kindred's nature vary across Runeterra, every mortal must choose the true face of their death.
blurb: Separate, but never parted, Kindred represents the twin essences of death. Lamb's bow offers a swift release from the mortal realm for those who accept their fate. Wolf hunts down those who run from their end, delivering violent finality within his...
allytips: Moving around between attacks while jungling will help you avoid damage and also generate more heals from Wolf's Frenzy.
Pick which Hunts you want to pursue carefully; getting many of them is the key to success as the game goes on.
Don't go in first to a large team fight. Wait for your teammates to initiate.
enemytips: Kindred is fragile - turn the pressure up on her, and she will be forced to play cautiously.
Clear the Hunts Wolf activates on jungle camps to slow down Kindred's damage output.
When Kindred uses Lamb's Respite get inside, it stops all champions from dying.

riot_spell_q.name: Dance of Arrows
riot_spell_q.description: Kindred tumbles and shoots up to three arrows at nearby targets.
riot_spell_q.tooltip:
Lamb vaults, firing up to 3 arrows at nearby enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and gains {{ f2 }}% bonus attack speed for {{ e8 }} seconds.

Casting Wolf's Frenzy or vaulting inside of its effect reduces the cooldown of this spell to {{ e4 }} seconds.

riot_spell_w.name: Wolf's Frenzy
riot_spell_w.description: Wolf enrages and attacks enemies around him.  Lamb passively gains stacks by moving and attacking. When fully charged, Lamb's next attack restores health.
riot_spell_w.tooltip:
Passive: As Kindred move and attack they build stacks of Hunter's Vigor, up to a maximum of 100. At full stacks Lamb's next basic attack restores up to {{ f1 }} health based on how much health Kindred is missing.

Active: Wolf claims a territory, attacking nearby enemies inside it for {{ e4 }} seconds. Lamb can redirect Wolf to new targets by attacking them. If Lamb leaves Wolf's territory he will cease attacking and join her.

Wolf's attacks deal magic damage equal to {{ e5 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ f3 }}% of the target's current health.

Wolf attacks faster based on Kindred's attack speed. His attacks maim monsters for {{ e7 }}% increased damage and reduce their Movement Speed by {{ e8 }}% for 2 seconds.

riot_spell_e.name: Mounting Dread
riot_spell_e.description: Lamb fires a carefully placed shot, slowing the target. If Lamb attacks the target two more times, her third attack instead directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, savaging them for massive damage.
riot_spell_e.tooltip:
Cripple an enemy, slowing their movement speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e8 }} second.

After Lamb attacks the target twice, her third attack instead directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ f2 }}% of the target's missing health as bonus physical damage.

Wolf's attack critically strikes targets for {{ e6 }}% increased damage if they are below {{ e5 }}% (+{{ f3 }}%) health (Increased by Critical Strike Chance).

[Maximum {{ e0 }} vs. monsters]

riot_spell_r.name: Lamb's Respite
riot_spell_r.description: Lamb grants all living things inside a zone a respite from death. Until the effect ends, nothing can die. At the end, units are healed.
riot_spell_r.tooltip:
Lamb blesses the ground underneath her for {{ e2 }} seconds, creating an area in which no living things, ally or enemy, can die. Upon reaching 10% Health, units become immune to further damage or healing.

When the blessing ends all living things inside heal for {{ e1 }}.

riot_spell_i.name: Mark of the Kindred
riot_spell_i.description: Kindred can mark targets to Hunt. Successfully completing a Hunt permanently empowers Kindred's basic abilities. Every 4 hunts completed also increases Kindred's basic attack range.

wikia_skill_i1.name: Mark of the Kindred
wikia_skill_i1.blurb: Kindred can mark targets to Hunt. Successfully completing a Hunt permanently empowers Kindred's basic abilities. Every 4 hunts completed also increases Kindred's basic attack range.
wikia_skill_i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Both '''Lamb''' and '''Wolf''' mark targets to ''hunt''. Scoring a {{tip|takedown}} on a marked target permanently empowers '''Kindred's''' abilities, as well as granting '''Lamb''' {{pp|type=Marks|8|75|100|125|150|175|200|225|250|4|7|10|13|16|19|22|25|formula=+75 at 4 Marks, and +25 every 3 Marks thereafter, up to 250 bonus range at 25 Marks.}} {{sti|range|'''bonus''' range}} on her basic attacks and abilities.
wikia_skill_i1.description2: {{sbc|Lamb - Enemy Champions:}} '''Lamb''' is offered a selection of {{tip|champions}} to take down, which is hidden while {{tt|in combat with an enemy champion|6 seconds timer}}. Once selected, there's an 8 seconds delay before the ''Mark'' can be collected, and '''Lamb''' can change her target if the target hasn't died during a period of time. ''Targets successfully hunted cannot be targeted again for 4 minutes.''
wikia_skill_i1.static: {{tt|40|Upon marked monster camp's death, even if Kindred are not involved}} / {{tt|75|Upon selecting/changing target}}
wikia_skill_i1.notes: * Gaining marks will increase the target acquisition range for {{ai|Dance of Arrows|Kindred}}.

wikia_skill_q1.name: Dance of Arrows
wikia_skill_q1.blurb: Kindred tumbles and shoots up to three arrows at nearby targets.
wikia_skill_q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lamb''' {{tip|dashes}} in the target direction, gaining 25% {{as|(+ 5% per {{ai|Mark of the Kindred|Kindred|Mark}})|buzzword}} {{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}} for 4 seconds while firing up to three arrows to nearby targets, dealing {{as|physical damage}}. '''Lamb's''' current attack target at any proximity will be prioritized by one of the arrows.
wikia_skill_q1.description2: Casting {{ai|Wolf's Frenzy|Kindred}} or dashing while inside the area will reduce '''Dance of Arrows'''' {{sti|cooldown}}.
wikia_skill_q1.description3: ''Dance of Arrows'' resets '''Lamb's''' basic attack timer.

wikia_skill_w1.name: Wolf's Frenzy
wikia_skill_w1.blurb: Wolf enrages and attacks enemies around him.
wikia_skill_w1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} As '''Kindred''' move and attack, they build up to 100 stacks of ''Hunter's Vigor''. At full stacks, '''Lamb's''' next basic attack restores up to {{as|{{sti|health|{{pp|32 to 100}} health}}|health}}, based on {{as|'''Kindred's''' '''missing''' health}}.
wikia_skill_w1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Wolf''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target location and claims the surrounding area as his territory for the next {{fd|8.5}} seconds, separating from '''Lamb'''. '''Wolf''' [[Champion summoned units|autonomously]] attacks enemies within the area, prioritizing '''Lamb's''' attack target.
wikia_skill_w1.description3: '''Wolf's''' basic attacks deal {{as|magic damage}} and scale with {{as|25% of '''Kindred's bonus''' attack speed}}. Against [[monster]]s, '''Wolf''' deals 50% increased damage and his attacks {{tip|slow}} his target by 50% for 2 seconds.
wikia_skill_w1.leveling3: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|25 to 45}} {{as|(+ 20% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{fd|1.5}}% {{as|(+ 1% per {{ai|Mark of the Kindred|Kindred|Mark}})|buzzword}} of target's '''current''' health)}}}}
wikia_skill_w1.description4: ''Wolf's Frenzy'' ends immediately if '''Lamb''' leaves the area.
wikia_skill_w1.notes:
* '''Wolf''' is untargetable, invulnerable and {{tip|ghosted}}, but cannot move through terrain other than the initial dash on activation.
* '''Wolf''' is not able to re-target {{ui|Rift Scuttler}} if he loses sight of it while he's attacking it.

wikia_skill_e1.name: Mounting Dread
wikia_skill_e1.blurb: Lamb fires a carefully placed shot, slowing the target. If Lamb attacks the target two more times, her third attack instead directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, savaging them for massive damage.
wikia_skill_e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lamb''' cripples the target unit, {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 50% for 1 second.
wikia_skill_e1.description2: If '''Lamb''' manages to attack the target twice with no longer than 4 seconds between each attack after casting '''Mounting Dread''', her third attack within the following 4 seconds directs '''Wolf''' to pounce the target, dealing {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}, capped against monster at 300 bonus damage.
wikia_skill_e1.leveling2: {{st|Bonus Physical Damage|{{ap|80 to 160}} {{as|(+ 80% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 8% {{as|(+ {{fd|0.5}}% per {{ai|Mark of the Kindred|Kindred|Mark}})|buzzword}} of target's '''missing''' health)}}}}
wikia_skill_e1.description3: '''Wolf's''' pounce will {{tip|critically strike}} for {{as|50% {{critical damage|150}}|physical damage}} {{tip|physical damage|{{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}}} against targets below {{as|15% {{as|(+ 0.5% per 1% critical strike chance)}} of their '''maximum''' health}} (this applies to monsters as well).

wikia_skill_r1.name: Lamb's Respite
wikia_skill_r1.blurb: Lamb grants all living things inside a zone a respite from death. Until the effect ends, nothing can die. At the end, units are healed.
wikia_skill_r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lamb''' blesses the ground under herself for 4 seconds. While inside the area, '''all units''' {{tip|invulnerability|cannot}} be reduced below {{as|{{sti|health|10% their '''maximum''' health}}}}. Units in the area who reach the threshold cannot be healed for the remaining duration.
wikia_skill_r1.description3: All units within the zone are {{tip|heal|healed}} immediately when the blessing ends.
wikia_skill_r1.notes: * Any given unit's {{sti|health regeneration}} will still be active while inside ''Lamb's Respite''.
